selected_links.title: Missed bin updates | Tamworth Borough Council
strengths: Directly relates to the search term 'council customer information needs'
Provides information about missed bin collections
selected_links.reasoning: This website gives specific details on missed bin collections, which are a common customer complaint or question. This would be the most direct and relevant link for council customer information needs.

context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

recommendation.reason: Link appears suitable for user needs
next_steps: Follow the link to access the content

Reason.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.
Reason.reasoning: The content provides a phone number (0345 002 0022) to call for missed bin collections and a link to an online missed bin form, which would help residents report missed bins. However, it doesn't specify a time frame for when they will be collected or what actions to take if the bin was not missed on the dates listed.
Reason.next_actions: Call the provided phone number or fill out the online missed bin form.

analysis.overall_assessment: The content provides useful information for reporting a missed bin collection. However, more specific details would be appreciated, such as potential time frames or additional contact options, to better serve residents' needs.
